contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Qira County |native_name = چىرا ناھىيىسى<br>策勒县 |pushpin_label_position = right |pushpin_map_caption = Location within China |pushpin_mapsize = 275 |seat_type = City seat |settlement_type = [[County (People's Republic of China)|County]] |image_skyline = |image_map = |map_caption = Location of the county |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[People's Republic of China|China]] |subdivision_type1 = [[Province of China|Province]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Xinjiang]] |subdivision_type2 = [[Administrative divisions of the People's Republic of China#Prefecture level|Prefecture-level divisions]] |subdivision_name2 = [[Hotan Prefecture]] |area_total_km2 = |population = |population_as_of = |population_density_km2 = auto |population_density_urban_km2 = auto |latNS = |latd = |latm = |lats = |longEW = |longd = |longm = |longs = |elevation_ft = |elevation_m = |timezone = [[China Standard Time|China Standard]] |utc_offset = +8 |website = }} The '''Qira (Chira) County''' ({{ug|چىرا ناھىيىسى|Chira Nahiyisi|Qira Nah̡iyisi}}) is a county within the [[Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region]] and is under the administration of the [[Hotan Prefecture]].<ref>The official spelling is "Qira" according to ''Zhōngguó dìmínglù'' 中国地名录 (Beijing, ''Zhōngguó dìtú chūbǎnshè'' 中国地图出版社 1997); ISBN 7-5031-1718-4; p. 308.</ref> It contains an area of 31,590 km<sup>2</sup>. According to the 2002 census, it has a population of 130,000. {{Xinjiang Administrative Divisions}} ==Footnotes== <references /> {{Coord|37|02|N|80|53|E|source:trwiki_region:CN_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:County-level divisions of Xinjiang]] [[Category:Hotan Prefecture]] {{Xinjiang-geo-stub}}
